titles.title: Hoshi o Katta Hi
The Day I Cropped a Star
The Day I Bought a Star
Hoshi wo Katta Hi
星をかった日

recommendations.recommendation: Absolutely one of the best short films I`ve ever seen. Visually stunning, touching in a feel-good way, but not sappy or anything. I bought two tickets to the Ghibli Museum for the same day just so I could see it again. If you can make it to the Ghibli Museum to see this film someday, do so. You will be glad you did.

anime.description: * Based on the original story Iblard by http://anidb.net/cr11227 [Inoue Naohisa]. A strange story in an imaginary world, Iblard. A boy, Nona, is walking in a desert alone. He meets a strange woman, Ninya, and starts living in her farm. One day, Nona gets a seed of a star in return of vegetables, and decides to grow it. [i]Note: The fifth in a series of short films produced to screen exclusively at the http://anidb.net/cr729 [Studio Ghibli] Museum in Japan. There has been no commercial release for this film, which premiered at the museum`s Saturn Theater on 3 January 2006.[/i]
